lsystem.collection

Class CSList

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsystem.collection.CSList

  • public class CSList
extends Object
    A storage class for context sensitive LSystem rules, accepts simple LSystem rules as well (however as yet stochastic rules are not accepted). The expected format for context is 'x>z' or 'x<z' where x is the context char. '<' is before and '>' is after z is the premis or character to be replaced. There is ability to ignore certain characters (eg []0-9) when determining context.
